sentences.en: They had now acquired the war - horse and the war - chariot, which the Hyksos had brought to them.
sentences.cn: 他们现在得到了战马和战车, 那是希克索斯带给他们的.

trans.tran_cn: 希克索斯王朝（公元前18-16世纪统治埃及，亦称“牧人王朝”）
trans.tran_en: a member of a nomadic Asian people, probably Semites, who controlled Egypt from 1720 bc until 1560 bc
